name: Mask Manor
description:
Can you find the stolen mask?...And live to tell the tale?

====================MASK MANOR====================

      From the makers of Good Boy:  Mask Manor is a first-person survival horror game inspired by Resident Evil games, both new and classic. The game features voice acting a hand-drawn art style, and a original sound track. Mask Manor contains 3 'Acts' to its story and is currently still in development.

=====Story=====

      An ancient mask has been stolen from the museum in Basket City! Its your job as detective Michael Wilson and his trusty partner Colin Walker to bring this invaluable object back to the museum. A new lead brings you to a place on the city outskirts called the Mask Manor, what secrets could possibly wait within?

====Features====

  • A strange story?
  • Hand drawn environments and characters by Josh Wakin.
  • A elaborate setting filled with secrets .
  • Original Music composed by Anthony Mays.

===CONTROLS===

WASD= move                                                  E=Use

Mouse=Look                                                  I=Inventory

 R=Reload

=====About the DEMO=====

The demo features Act 1 and the beginning  part of Act 2.

The full game will be released for 5$ once the full game has been completed.
